ygData.subject: Re: Trouble in the lab
ygData.msgSnippet: I am a warrior, nobody said anything about honor. he raised his sword and moved forward to stand at eye level with the halfling before him. Let s do this so

"I am a warrior, nobody said anything about honor." he raised his 
sword and moved forward to stand at eye level with the halfling 
before him. "Let's do this so you can die young." he placed both 
hands on his sword awaiting her challenge.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Ice::
> 
> She squawked and reared up. "Maximal or not. Drop your weapon and 
> we'll fight this honorably, claw to claw." She glared at this 
> bot. "Or are you that much of a coward."
> 
> She hoped to get this bot and good. But she had no weapons. None 
made 
> out of metal anyway. She waited for this bot to drop his sword.
